message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this valuable product.  Given its worth, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I'm not comfortable with the initial price. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I value the product at a higher price point. Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
